item.description:
This movie will be shown as a part of the Inner Peace Festival organized by the Center of Light in Framingham from 2 to 9pm. The movie will start at 7pm after a half hour guided meditation on Peace at 6pm. More info on the Inner Peace Festival to follow.

ABOUT THE MOVIE BARAKA:

In the ancient Sufi language, it is a word that translate to ‘the thread that weaves life together’ Originally shot in 24 country on six continent, BARAKA brought together a series of stunningly photographed scenes to capture what director Ron Fricke calls a ‘a guided meditation on humanity” There are wonders of a world without words, viewed through a man and nature own’s prism s of symmetry, savagery, harmony and chaos. The goal of the film”, says producer Mark Magidson, “ was to reach past language, nationality, religion and politics and speak to the inner viewer.”
item.name: Movie: Baraka
